Ability: Choose one person at night to disguise as.

Attributes:
-Disguise your self as someone at night.
-If your target dies you swap names, houses, and, avatars.
-You only have 3 disguises
-If there are no killing roles in the mafia you become a Mafioso
-You can talk with other members of the mafia at night

Goal: Kill anyone that will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:
Sheriff - Your target is a member of the Mafia.
Investigator - Your target enjoys tricking people. They could be a Jester or Disguiser
Consigliere - N/A

Win Conditions:
Must kill Town
Must kill Serial Killers
Must kill Arsonists
Win with Mafia
Win with Witches
Win with Survivors

Ability: Choose one person at night to frame.

Attributes:
-Investigators will see framed targets as Framer.
-Sheriffs will see framed targets as Mafia.
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become Mafioso
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.

Goal: Kill anyone who will not submit to the Mafia.

Investigation Results:

Investigator - Your target is good with documents. They must be a Framer

Ability: Choose one person at night to clean.

Attributes:
-If your target dies at night their role and last will will not be shown to the town.
-You only have 3 cleanings.
-Only you will know the role and get to see the last will.
-If there are no kill capable Mafia roles left you will become Mafioso
-You can talk with the other Mafia at night.
